articles.title: Wendy Williams thanks fans for support after dementia and aphasia diagnosis - BBC.com
articles.description: The talk show host says she feels "immense gratitude" for the supportive messages sent to her.
articles.content:
By Charlotte GallagherCulture correspondent
Wendy Williams says she continues to need "personal space and peace to thrive"
Former US talk show host Wendy Williams has thanked fans for their support… [+2021 chars]
